DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, multicenter, non-randomized study to determine the performance of NUVANT Mobile Cardiac Telemetry system in arrhythmia detection.
DOC.detailed_description: Arrhythmia patients will be externally monitored. The collected information will be used to evaluate the NUVANT MCT system.
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Patients undergoing remote ambulatory electrocardiographic monitoring Is participating in another clinical study that may confound the results of this study
